Html: Is this present? Or is there any plan to provide it?

I'm not sure if i understand in other words: what do you mean?
OpenXML is a file format, modern office versions support them, you can open and save openxml based files.
you can open or save these files also with netoffice of course.
a lot of nice codeplex projects online to deal with openoffice xml files without an installed office. my favourite is ClosedXML
most of these projects supports excel only. are you interesst for openxml support by word or another office application?

regards
sebastian
